Developer Terms of Use
des: The IntelliFire skill for Amazon Alexa requires an IntelliFire Touch compatible fireplace or stove and the installation of a Wi-Fi Module (IFT-WFM). An active IntelliFire Account with one or more compatible fireplace(s) or stove(s) is required. The IntelliFire skill for Amazon Alexa allows for full control of your fireplace or stove, including: Flame On/Off, Flame Height, Light Level, Fan Level, and Thermostat Setpoint. These features may vary based on what your fireplace or stove came equipped with. If you require assistance with the IntelliFire Skill, please feel free to connect with us AppFeedback@hearthnhome.com.
